resources.string: 略过100%和“适应屏幕”之间的缩放步骤 (150%, 200%等)。
Can\'t load custom codec. Use default codec instead.
On-screen brightness control will be disabled when manual brightness control is turned off.
System\'s auto brightness control should be turned off to use this function on some devices.
You have to designate at least one folder.
Refresh media list to apply the changes to take effect.
Enable edit menu which allows you to delete or rename files and folders.
Use this mode if you have issues with screen layout.
%1$s should be installed to send the system log. Would you like to install it now?
Please restart app for changes to take effect.
Please select items to be included in the error reporting.
The following codec file has been found. Do you want to use this file as the custom codec?
Set audio delay time for audio synchronization. It may not be used with HW decoder.
Stop other players while playing back videos or audios. It also makes MX Player stop if other players begin to play or you make a phone call.
Language of the audio track you want to use. It may not be used with HW decoder.
Return to the list after playback is completed.
Set Bluetooth audio delay time for audio synchronization. It may not be used with HW decoder.
Turn off main buttons\' backlight during playback. (If backlight keeps turning on in spite of this option, uncheck this option and reboot device if necessary)
Enter seconds to adjust playback position of HW decoder. This is useful when playback position is displayed incorrectly.
Can\'t find custom codec. Please use version %1$s %2$s codec.
Can\'t open the download manager. Please check system settings.
Can\'t run the log collector. Please try again later.
Can\'t access system log. Please check FAQ for more information.
Clear all user activity records, including playback and search history.
Clear thumbnails cached on the sdcard. Thumbnails will be generated again when media list is opened.
Deinterlace by default. Currently deinterlacing works only with SW decoder.
Use SW audio decoder instead of HW audio decoder.
Please leave your comments, suggestions or bug reports.
Are you sure to clear all playback and search history?
Are you sure to clear all thumbnails?
Sentences that start with \"/\" (forward slash) will be displayed in italics.
Enter number of days to display \"NEW\" tag:
\"NEW\" tag will be displayed if the file was copied within this period.
Exclude any media file from a video list if a \".nomedia\" file exists in that folder or a parent folder.
Select folders to be included in the media library.
Show hidden folders and files starting with \".\" (dot).
Select character encoding of your subtitle file.
Input controls: Touch actions, gestures, lock mode, etc.
Navigation settings: seeking settings, forward/backward buttons, etc.
Screen settings: orientation, full screen, brightness, etc.
Subtitle layout settings: alignment, padding, background color.
Subtitle text settings: font, size, color, border, etc.
Select file extensions for folder scanning. It is possible to configure decoders per extension types.
Set delay time for resizing videos on hardware decoders. Set higher value if screen flickers severely or freezes while resizing.
Please make sure that your storage is not mounted as read-only.
Clear font cache for SubStation Alpha subtitle in case of corruption.
YUV is experimental and does not work on all devices.
It is recommended that \'soft buttons hiding\' be used with \'full time full screen view\'.
%1$s requires one or more Google Play services that are not currently available. Please contact the developer for assistance.
%1$s won\'t work unless you enable Google Play services.
%1$s won\'t run without Google Play services, which are missing from your phone.
%1$s won\'t run without Google Play services, which are missing from your tablet.
The specified account does not exist on this device. Please choose a different account.
A data connection is required to connect to Google Play services.
Accessing accounts from a restricted profile is not supported.
Error signing in the specified account. Please choose a different account.
%1$s is having trouble with Google Play services. If the problem persists, please contact the developer for assistance.
%1$s relies on Google Play services, which is not supported by your device. Contact the manufacturer for assistance.
%1$s won\'t run unless you update Google Play services.
%1$s won\'t run without Google Play services, which are currently updating.
New version of Google Play services needed. It will update itself shortly.
%1$s already exists.\nDo you want to replace it?
Please wait a moment while initializing codec.
Specify the maximum number of CPU cores to be used for SW decoding.
Correct aspect ratio of HW decoded videos. Use this option if HW decoder ignores aspect ratio.
Use custom ffmpeg build. Please beware that an invalid file may crash app.
Enter default playback speed in percent(%%). Valid range is %1$d%% to %2$d%%.
Set default time adjustment for subtitle track synchronization.
Use SW decoder for network play from remote sources via HTTP, FTP, RTSP, MMS and more.
Please describe the problem in detail.
Display cover art on the lock screen.
Display the current position while changing position
Press the back button twice to close the playback screen.
All %1$s files on the following %2$s will be deleted permanently.
However, all other files and subfolders will be left untouched.
This email address belongs to an existing account.
Can\'t create state save file. Please check free space and write permissions of the device or reinstall app if problem continues.
Can\'t use selected audio track. Using default track instead.
Codec initialization failed. Please try again after checking the remaining storage space.
Codec is not installed yet.\nPress %1$s to download for installation.
Installed codec is out of date, please reinstall the latest version.
An error occurred while writing on internal data file. Please check storage space and try again. You can uninstall the app completely then reinstall it if the problem persists.
An unexpected I/O error occurred. Can\'t proceed anymore.
Can\'t read this file. Please make sure that the file is a valid format.
Can\'t read this file. Please make sure that the file is a valid format.
Component files are corrupted or Android internal modules are not compatible with current version of MX Player.
SD card file system is not recognized.
This SD card is not in use.
Can\'t find movies matching this name.
This file format is not supported on %1$s.
App version you have is outdated to use the installed codec, please upgrade to the latest version.
App is not installed properly. Please uninstall completely then reinstall it.
Codec is not installed properly. Please uninstall completely then reinstall it.
There is a file or folder with the same name.
Error occurred during communicating with the server. Please try again later.
Error occurred during communicating with the server.
Error occurred during communicating with %1$s. Please try again later.
This subtitle does not exist on %1$s. Please upload subtitle first.
You have no permission to perform this action on %1$s.
An unexpected error has occurred, please try again later.
Subtitle format can\'t be recognized on %1$s.
Export settings and activity records to a file.
Can\'t export to a file. Please make sure that your storage is not mounted as read-only.
Can\'t read file or not a valid export file.
Seek to nearest keyframe position instead of exact position. This setting applies to HW+ and SW decoder.
Beginning with Android 4.4 KitKat, it may not be possible to remove or rename files on external storage due to change of Android security policy.
Force LTR (Left to Right) direction for RTL (Right to Left) subtitles.
Show system volume panel while changing volume with the headset plugged in.
Override \'User-Agent\' on connecting to web server. Leave blank to use default value.

Turn it off only if HW decoder crashes immediately after changing audio track or playing videos using an unsupported audio codec. If this option is turned off, custom audio codecs will not be used automatically with HW decoder.
Ignore broken fonts specified in SSA subtitles (experimental)
Ignore font specified in SSA subtitles
Import settings and activity records from a file.
Import completed. Restarting app for changes to take effect.
Please wait a moment while initializing the app.
The following folder will be hidden from the list.
Hiding applies only to MX Player. Manage hidden folders on [Settings] → [List] → [Folders].
This will restore its default settings.
Do not inform of this update again
A new version is available. Would you like to upgrade now?\n(Current: %1$s Latest: %2$s)
Tap each corner of the screen clockwise to unlock the screen.
Display last played media in italics.
The product information could not be verified.
The purchase history of this product cannot be found. Please check the internet connection and try again.
The product purchase history could not be verified due to temporary technical issue(s). Please check the internet connection and try again later.
Press the button below to open the product purchase page.
Place a floating button on the bottom right corner of the screen to start last played media.
Select methods for refreshing the media library.
Show interface when locked screen is touched
Can\'t collect log. Please check if there is enough space on the device.
It will read and send system logs via email. You will have an opportunity to cancel sending email.
Mark last played media in each folders.
%1$s is not installed. Please install the program and try again.
Respond to media control buttons from headset, bluetooth, etc.
E-mail address should be verified to complete account creation. Please check your e-mail inbox.
You need to sign in to %1$s to register a new movie.
You need to sign in to %1$s to give a rating.
No media files in this folder.
Press refresh button on the top right corner to refresh the list. Also check [Settings] → [List] to reveal hidden files.

This version contains new hardware decoding engine named HW+. It can play back more videos with hardware acceleration but may not work on some devices.\n\nHW+ decoder can be activated on [Settings] → [Decoder].
Custom codec is out of date. Please replace it with the new version.
Use HW+ audio decoder if SW audio decoder fails in SW decoding mode.
Select video codecs to be used with HW+ decoder.
Set HW+ decoder as the default hardware decoder for local files.
Set HW+ decoder as the default hardware decoder for network play.
This product uses various open source softwares. Tap [here] to see copyright notices.
You can use letters, numbers, hyphens (-) and underlines (_).
Pause playback if obstrcuted by another window
Pause playback when wired/Bluetooth headset disconnected from the device.
Play HTTP/HTTPS media links. This option can interfere with file downloading.
Hardware acceleration will be used to render subtitles and on-screen controls.
Press the back button again to return to the previous screen.
Treat Next/Prev media buttons as FF/Rew button.
Storage access permission is required to scan and play media files on the device.
Contacts access permission is required to check license.
Remember selections for each files such as choice of audio track, subtitle track, decoder…
What steps will reproduce the problem?
Can\'t find information of %1$s. Please search movie or register a new movie.
Restarting app to load default settings.
All settings will be cleared.\n\nApp will be restarted for these changes to take effect.
Reset all settings to their default condition.
Do you wish to resume from where you stopped?
Select whether to resume from the point where you stopped.
Apply resume setting only on the first file. Next files will start from the beginning.
Beginning with Android 5.0 Lollipop, it may not be possible to remove or rename files on external storage without granting write permission to the app due to change of Android security policy.
Please choose the root directory of your external storage (e.g: usbcard1) on the following screen to grant MX Player write permission.
Can\'t save to a file due to the following reason: %1$s
{store_name} is currently not supported.\n\nIf you bought it from {store_name}, this is a scam. Please report to {store_company} and take your money back immediately.
Try other mode if default screen lock does not work.
Auto-scroll to position of the last played media.
Display preview image for network play.
Display preview image while changing playback position.
Switch to selection mode by touching the thumbnail or icon.
Display Quit button on the menu. This will terminate the app completely unlike \'back\' or \'home\' button.
Play last media to the end
If you select \'previous\' button, it will resume again from the beginning or open the previous file depending upon the current playback position.
This device has software navigation buttons. (back, home, menu, etc.) Check this option if buttons are not hidden automatically.
Use background play for audio playback.
Can\'t use HW decoder for background play. Please try HW+ or SW decoder instead.
Audio playback will be continued in the background even after the screen turns off.
Allow texts to disappear smoothly using fade out effect.
A folder will be selected for subtitle search. Search action will be performed in directories which contain the video file and/or subtitle folder(s).
Use hardware acceleration on subtitle drawing.
Language of the subtitle track you want to use. It may not be used with HW decoder.
Can\'t download subtitles from %1$s since download limit reached for your IP address.\n\nPlease enter %1$s login information on the site selection window to remove IP address restriction.
Daily download limit reached for your %1$s account. Please contact %1$s to change download limit.
Choose whether to replace or to display together with the current subtitles.
You have to select at least one subtitle.
Show HW subtitle if HW decoder supports it.
You may search only limited number of subtitles without signing up to %1$s.
Adjust subtitle track synchronization for HW decoder.
Can\'t sign in to %1$s. Please enter correct login information.
Subtitle file will be uploaded without applying current synchronization adjustment. Please do NOT upload if timing of original subtitle file is incorrect.
Please leave questions, bug reports, or comments on the forum.
Skip to next video without displaying error message if video loading fails.
Use SW audio decoder for playing for local files stored on the device.
Use SW audio decoder for playing remote network sources.
Use SW decoder for local files stored on the device.
Synchronize sound volume with the system media volume.
And all who supports this product.
Toggle playback in response to \'play\' media button. This option is useful only for devices having trouble with the play button.
Try HW decoder if HW+ decoder fails.
Try HW+ decoder if HW decoder fails.
Ruby tag annotation will be displayed next to main text if this option is checked off.
Checking for updates. Please wait a moment.
Can\'t check for updates. Please check the internet connection and try again.
Didn\'t catch that, try speaking again.
No Internet connection. Voice search not available.
Can\'t reach voice search service at the moment.
Audio volume can be boosted up to 200% if you use HW+ or SW decoder.
Please wait a moment while building font cache.
Do not increase video size if it exceeds its display size. (HW decoder only)
Can\'t save files on your subtitle folder. Please check write permissions of %1$s.
Allow Ad to create a calendar event?
Allow Ad to store image in Picture gallery?
